name: Webriti Companion
author: Webriti

sections.description:
This plugin is the companion plugin for the Webriti themes. It creates the homepage sections like slider section, service section, portfolio section, and testimonial section in the Webriti themes.
Webriti Companion is a plugin build to enhance the functionality of WordPress Theme made by Webriti.
This plugin creates repeater controls in the customizer settings allowing you to create a live site without moving out to customizer screen.

External resources

Repeater Control:
Copyright: (c) 2016 Codeinwp cristian-ungureanu
License: MIT license
Source: https://github.com/Codeinwp/customizer-controls/tree/master/customizer-repeater

sections.changelog:
1.9.7

  • Added Spice Post slider Support for appointment theme.

1.9.6

  • Added Selective Refresh for appointment theme customizer settings.

1.9.5

  • Updated font-awesome library.
  • Updated freemius directory.

1.9.4

  • Updated some default icon values for appointment & elitepress themes.

1.9.3

  • Updated freemius directory.

1.9.2

  • Added Spice Post slider shortcode filed in customizer.

1.9.1

  • Added redirect link for appointment & busiprof themes.

1.9

  • Added header slider feature for wallstreet theme.

1.8.9

  • Fixed customizer theme mode issue for wallstreet child themes.

1.8.8

  • Added demo import feature and freemius directory for wallstreet theme.

1.8.7

  • Fixed the issue in busiprof service section when we created child theme.

1.8.6

  • Fixed the issues with PHP 8 in Appointment & its child themes.

1.8.5

  • Updated import feature for Appointment theme.

1.8.4

  • Added Demo Import feature with Elementor Starter Sites for Appointment theme.

1.8.3

  • Changed typography of the Appointment theme.

1.8.2

  • Added section variations for the Wallstreet Agency child theme.

1.8.1

  • Added section variations for the Busiprof Agency child theme.

1.8

  • Removed Google plus social icon in the Wallstreet theme.

1.7.9

  • Added section variations for the Appointee child theme.

1.7.8

  • Service section added for Rambo child theme.
  • Changed dummy content for Rambo theme.

1.7.7

  • Added flexslider for ElitePress theme.
  • Changed dummy content for ElitePress theme.

1.7.6

  • Added section variations for the Appointment Dark child themes.

1.7.5

  • Added section variations for the BusiProf child themes.
  • Changed dummy content for the BusiProf theme.
  • Other issues fixed.

1.7.4

  • Added section variations for the WallStreet child themes.
  • Changed dummy content for the Wallstreet theme.
  • Issue fixed for the self created child of Quality.
  • Other issues fixed.

1.7.3

  • Added service section variations for the Quality all child themes.
  • Changed dummy content for the Spasalon theme.

1.7.2

  • jQuery compatibility issue resolved with WP 5.5.

1.7.1

  • Added the service section variation in the Appointment child theme.
  • Removed the whitespaces from the files.
  • Changed dummy content of the appointment theme.
  • Fixed other issues.

1.7

  • Fixed the Spasalon theme issues and changed the images.
  • Fixed the Dreamspa theme issue.
  • Fixed the PHP tag issue for quality theme.

1.6

  • Added Busiprof theme homepage sections.

1.5

  • Updated images and moved custom controls from quality theme to plugin.
  • Fixed the issue of Appointment child themes.

1.4

  • Added Elitepress theme homepage sections.

1.3

  • Added Rambo theme homepage sections.

1.2

  • Added wallstreet theme homepage sections.

1.1

  • Added appointment theme homepage sections.

1.0.2

  • Remove unnecessary HTML markup and add title of portfolio.

1.0.1

  • Added Feedback form for quality theme.

1.0

  • Added child theme names of Quality and Spasalon theme.

0.9

  • Remove Lock Icon Sections from Quality theme.

0.8.8

  • Update Quality theme customizer settings.

0.8.7

  • Update readme file.

0.8.6

  • Fixed project issue in customizer and added the selective refresh for service and funfact.

0.8.5

  • Corrected Saniization

0.8.4

  • Fixed service icon and image issue in spasalon theme.

0.8.3

  • Add Quality homepage section ON/OFF setting.

0.8.2

  • Add custom child theme support.

0.8.1

  • Fixed Service issue in quality theme.

0.8

  • Fixed overlay color setting issue.

0.7

  • Added Child theme name.

0.6

  • Added Testimonial section in quality theme.

0.5

  • Added spasalon theme section.

0.4

  • Added child theme name.

0.3

  • Strings updated.

0.2

  • Move project setting in customizer.

0.1.1

  • Add functionality to set front page

0.1

  • First version of the plugin
sections.reviews:
After update nothing is working as before.

By webcattivo on February 1, 2021

I have used the free version of the template for years, it is for a no profit project. Now after update simple functions have been moved to the pro version. I have to spend an afternoon to update the sito or change theme. I do understand that it is a free version. If I needed tha pro I would have bought it from day one.

Webriti Crashed Site

By deenaw on November 19, 2020

This is a companion plugin for my theme. My site doesn't look right without it. Unfortunately it crashed my site and I wasn't able to access the login to fix it without several hour of troubleshooting. My site still doesn't display correctly. Do yourself a favor and skip any theme that needs this.

Doesnt work witch WP 5.5

By ajvngou_ on September 4, 2020

I used 1.0.2 version, after two years i updated to 1.7.2 and it was big error, whole website and admin doeasnt work. I must delete plugin via ftp. I tryed deactivate all 6 another plugins, update WP and after that update plugin = still error. So now i am still using 1.0.2. edit: fixed

No sense

By emanueleci on July 29, 2020

I dont want and dont like a plugin to make work my home page.

Forced to use this

By Gernot Gawlik (Goerni) on July 23, 2020

I use the theme vdperanto. Without this (senseless) PlugIn the Homepage doesn't work. Sorry, but this is not very reliable.

I would like to Give ZERO, but I can't

By Blogger (Rui Oliveira) on February 7, 2019

Not happy with the company support
